constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 45 (Wednesday, March 10, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. VELAZQUEZ:
H.R. 1780.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 1
The Congress shall have Power to . . . provide for the . .
. general Welfare of the United States; . . .
[Page H1327]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: Paris Climate Agreement Disclosure Act
